The training provided by Blackboard consultants includes the Learn Teaching Readiness Workshop — ULTRA & the Designing Exemplary Courses Workshop.
d1f6d23d-0a4f-4545-b010-45a59ff2ef35.name: ASU Blackboard Certified Power User

badge_template_activities.title: Learn Teaching Readiness Workshop — ULTRA  | This workshop provides hands-on instruction covering numerous course building, assessment, and communication tools available in Blackboard Learn. A variety of activities and best-practice discussions provide a very thorough understanding of how to manage teaching tasks efficiently and create dynamic learning environments for students.

Designing Exemplary Courses Workshop | Once instructors have mastered the features and functions of Blackboard Learn Course technology, they will be ready for advanced training on designing and constructing high-quality, instructionally sound courses. Using the Blackboard Exemplary Course Program rubric or another institutional rubric as a guide, this workshop prepares participants to transform a current course website from an informational resource to an interactive learning environment.
